title: Post-Vercel deploy: Configure webhook URLs
description:
After Vercel deployment, configure webhook URLs for:

1. **Front** - Create Front App, get webhook secret, configure URL
2. **Stripe** - Create webhook endpoint, get whsec_, configure events
3. **Inngest** - Register app URL in Inngest dashboard, get event key

All three need the production Vercel URL before they can be completed.

title: Wire up command group and register
Add CLI pattern hunting commands for Inngest analysis
description:
Add investigation/analysis commands to skill inngest CLI:

1. `skill inngest patterns [--last 24h]` - aggregate events by type, show success/fail/skip rates
2. `skill inngest failures [--last 24h]` - show failed runs with error details
3. `skill inngest event <id> --extract "field1,field2"` - extract specific fields from event/runs
4. `skill inngest analyze` - detect patterns like empty bodies, common classifications

Captures the manual investigation patterns used in debugging session - makes pattern hunting easy for agents and humans.

title: Wire up front commands in CLI index
Regenerate front-sdk types from OpenAPI spec
description:
Front has full OpenAPI spec: https://github.com/frontapp/front-api-specs/blob/main/core-api/core-api.json

Current front-sdk has manually written Zod schemas that are incomplete and don't handle nullable fields properly.

Should:
1. Use openapi-typescript or similar to generate types from spec
2. Generate Zod schemas from OpenAPI spec (or use zod-to-openapi)
3. Ensure all nullable fields are properly typed

Blocks: front CLI commands, any Front API integration reliability

title: Add `skill front` command set for debugging
description:
Add Front API commands to CLI for agent debugging:

1. `skill front message <id>` - fetch full message (body, author, recipients)
2. `skill front conversation <id>` - fetch conversation details
3. `skill front conversation <id> --messages` - list messages in conversation
4. `skill front inbox <id>` - get inbox info

Uses existing @skillrecordings/front-sdk. Helps debug webhook vs API data discrepancies (like the empty body issue).

title: Implement skill front CLI commands
description: Add Front API commands to CLI for debugging webhooks and API data discrepancies

title: Test front commands and fix any issues
Bug: Empty message body - Front API 401 error
description:
**Symptom**: Inbound messages have empty body, workflow classifies as "Empty message body" and skips

**Root Cause CONFIRMED**: Workflow's Front API fetch fails silently, falls back to empty body from webhook

**Evidence from function.finished event**:
```json
{
  "body": "",
  "classification": {
    "reasoning": "Empty message body"
  },
  "_links": {
    "message": "https://eggheadio.api.frontapp.com/messages/msg_31nagecl"
  }
}
```

- `_links.message` IS present in event data
- Workflow at line 70 tries: `front.getMessage(_links?.message || messageId)`
- Client handles URL extraction correctly (line 88-90)
- BUT fetch fails → catches error at line 124 → falls back to `event.data.messageBody` (empty)

**Fix**: Check FRONT_API_TOKEN in Vercel production env vars for the Inngest worker
- CLI works locally with token from `.env.local`
- Production workflow likely missing/invalid token

**To verify**: Check Inngest/Vercel logs for "Front API error" or 401 responses

title: Fix front-sdk schema nullable fields
description:
Multiple fields in front-sdk schemas that can be null from the API are not marked as nullable:
- recipients[]._links.related.contact (see mem-xxx for details)
- Likely others

Causing Zod validation failures when using the SDK. Need to audit schemas against actual API responses and make nullable fields nullable.

title: Fix front-sdk schemas from OpenAPI spec
description: Fix nullable fields in front-sdk schemas to match Front OpenAPI spec. Current schemas are too strict and cause Zod validation failures.

title: Audit and fix ConversationSchema nullable fields
Test front CLI commands after fixes
Fix MySQL2 sslaccept warning in CLI
description:
CLI outputs warning on every command:
`Ignoring invalid configuration option passed to Connection: sslaccept`

This comes from @skillrecordings/database package - the mysql2 connection config has `sslaccept` which is deprecated. Need to update to the correct SSL config format.

Source: packages/database connection config

title: HATEOAS pass on skill CLI - add contextual next-action hints to all commands
description:
The CLI should teach agents how to use it effectively. Every command output should include `_hints` or `_next_actions` suggesting what to do next based on context.

Examples:
- `skill inngest inspect` → suggests memory store/search commands
- `skill inngest failures` → suggests investigating patterns, storing learnings  
- `skill front conversation` → suggests memory search for customer history
- `skill memory find` → suggests voting after using results

This becomes part of the CLI's "soul" - it's not just a tool, it's a teacher.

Pattern: `_memory_hints` for memory-specific actions, `_next_actions` for general workflow suggestions.

Reference: docs/support-app-prd/81-semantic-memory.md (HATEOAS-Style Memory Hints section)

Purchase lookup fails for feedback form emails (reply-to vs from)
description:
**Issue**: Agent said "no purchases on record" for denisleeyt@gmail.com who has a $795 Complete Volume purchase.

**Root cause**: Message came through Total TypeScript Feedback form:
- `from`: team@totaltypescript.com (feedback form)
- `reply-to`: denisleeyt@gmail.com (actual customer)

Agent looked up the wrong email (team@totaltypescript.com instead of denisleeyt@gmail.com).

**Message ID**: msg_31njyfs5

**Investigation needed**:
1. Check how we extract customer email from Front messages
2. Look at recipients array for `reply-to` role
3. Legacy plugin gets this right - compare implementation
4. May need to prioritize reply-to over from for feedback forms

**Files to check**:
- packages/core/src/inngest/workflows/handle-inbound-message.ts (senderEmail extraction)
- packages/core/src/front/client.ts
- SDK lookupUser tool

title: Fix reply-to email extraction for feedback forms
description: Agent looks up purchases using feedback form email (team@totaltypescript.com) instead of actual customer email (denisleeyt@gmail.com in reply-to). Fix email extraction to prioritize reply-to for inbound messages. Bug: support--9g8oe-mkpjtbkxnsz

Add product availability/inventory tool for live events
description:
## Context
cnv_1jdlplgl: Customer asked if workshop was sold out (Buy button not working). Agent incorrectly said "Not sold out" when it WAS sold out.

## Problem
Agent has no way to check product inventory/availability status. For live events (workshops, cohorts), this is critical information.

## Requirements
1. **SDK method**: `getProductStatus(productId)` returning availability, seats remaining, event date
2. **Agent tool**: `checkProductAvailability` that calls SDK
3. **Product type awareness**: Distinguish evergreen courses vs time-limited live events

## Example Response
```typescript
{
  available: false,
  soldOut: true,
  seatsRemaining: 0,
  totalSeats: 50,
  eventDate: "2026-01-25T18:00:00Z",
  productType: "live_workshop"
}
```

## Affected Apps
- ai-hero (workshops)
- Potentially others with live events

title: Product availability SDK + agent tool
description: Add ProductStatus type, SDK method, agent tool to check product inventory. Fixes incorrect sold-out status in cnv_1jdlplgl.

title: SDK: Add ProductStatus types + Zod schema
SDK: Add getProductStatus to SupportIntegration interface
